longBusinessSummary: Kaneka Corporation manufactures and sells chemicals, functional and expandable plastics and, foodstuffs, life science, electronic, and synthetic fibers products in Japan and internationally. The company offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), crosslinked PVC, PVC-PVAc polymers, paste PVC, acryl grafted-vinyl chloride copolymer, and chlorinated PVC. It also provides impact modifiers, processing aids, specialty additives, toughener for thermosetting resins, silyl-terminated polyether, acrylic silicon, terminally reactive liquid acrylic, and biodegradable polymer, engineering resin for injection molding, zero birefringence, acrylic film, and isobutylene-based thermoplastic elastomer products. In addition, the company offers polypropylene and kanelite foams, extruded polystyrene foam insulation, polyimide film, transparent film for optical use, high thermal conductive graphite sheets, bonded magnets, multi-layer insulation, transparent conductive film, and thermo-resistant, and light-resistant transparent resin products. Further, it provides photovoltaic power generation systems for residences, public, and industrial installations; eco fur, flame-retardant, hair accessory, and new materials; organic EL lighting panels; and biosurfactant. Additionally, the company offers intervention, blood purification, gastroenterology intervention, ophthalmic medical device, testing equipment, regenerative medicine and cell therapy, and genetic diagnostic products; and low molecular pharmaceutical materials, affinity chromatography resin for purification of monoclonal antibody, biopharmaceuticals, transdermal medicine, and innerwear. It offers dairy products, margarine, fat and oils, whipping cream, filling, baker's yeast/ dough improver, processed fruits, butter, shortening, cacao butter, cream for kneading and other uses, frozen dough, spices, antifreeze materials, and pharma and supplemental nutrition solutions. Kaneka Corporation was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
